Night Shift keeps up with scorponok, as he kicks up dust beneath his tires =
while he rolls over uneven ground without much trouble.

" I dunno where th=
at Matrix is now.  I'm sure Tucson's already figured me out'n hid it somewh=
ere else.  It used ta be in Prime's chest, but I don't think that's where i=
t is anymore.  I know that bot Scorponok, he's not stupid.  If he feels tha=
t somethn' ain't right, he'll go out of his way ta make sure nothn' goes wr=
ong.  And I saw inside his chest, he doesn't have it in 'em, that was a lie=
.  If anything, he probably has it hidden somewhere in a different grid all=
 together."  

As he moves further and further away from the Ark, Tucson qu=
ietly transforms back into SUV mode and slowly rolls back into the Ark, bei=
ng careful to use dense vegitation around him as a cover up.  He gets insid=
e and closes the door leading into it.

" I'm in."  

Tucson puts out a han=
d, to sense redsidual energy, and finds it.  His senses lead him back to th=
e body of Optimus Prime.  He kneels down in respect and touches nothing upo=
n doing so.

" It took me a little while to understand what you meant by "S=
elf Worth."  But now, I do.  I'm no God, but I am very valuable to a cause =
known as change,innovation,freedom, justice and resolve.  After I've accomp=
lished these feats, I am valuable as a keeper of peace, and hopefully a pro=
moter of evolution.  Perhaps one day, I'll even be able to make an ally out=
 of an enemy and promote integration among the factions.  But first, there =
are those who show great greed in power and have taken three of my own in p=
ersuit of it.  One of them being our trusted leader, Rodimus Prime who has =
always been the stronghold of our faction.  Matrix, you may seem this very =
bold of me, and rather brash.  I appologize if I seem so."

He gets up onto=
 his feet.

" My roots have traced me back to Optimus Prime, who was not on=
ly a much admired leader, but also a beloved relative.  And as a relative o=
f Optimus Prime, I too, am ready to embrace the vows he once took upon reci=
eving the Matrix of Leadership.  I'm ready Matrix, I'M READY TO LIGHT OUR D=
ARKEST HOUR!"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclon=
us@...> wrote:

nt yet. I think they're buying into him. When they go, and are well out of =
range, tell me, and I'll return inside the Ark. Night Shift's doing his par=
t, now it's my turn to do mine."
> >
> > He pauses between text messages.
>=
 >
> > " By the way, be ready to light our darkest hour. It's time."
>

ay be expecting me."
> 
> Lord Elder sat at his console watching both the i=
nformation that came
> across his screen as well as the sensors and cameras=
 that told him
> what was going on. he watched as Scorponok and Nightshift =
moved away.
> 
> "I hope Nightshift has not gotten himself into more than h=
e can
> handle." he sent back to Tuscon. "If you have some power with the
>=
 Matrix, it may soon be needed."
